SimpleScrollPane
public class SimpleScrollPane.ScrollButton
extends JideButton
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource

The scroll button for SimpleScrollPane. You can extend this class to create your own buttons.
